channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Rectory Place - Road requires some TLC, 1st January
item.description:
Requires a litter pick / street clean please as well as collection of rotting leaves. Lots of litter incl. rotting newspapers, crisps packets, plastic bags and other paraphernalia. Could you please dedicate a litter pick session to this area as this is an eye sore and people see this all day every day. Thank you.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Charles Grinling Walk, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Please fill grit bin on North View, 1st January
item.description:
The grit/salt bin on North View is not half full and we are coming to sub zero temps and sleet in the forecast.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, North View Road, Hornsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.category: Damage - pole leaning / equipment detached from pole/facing the wrong direction

item.title: 169 Dorchester Avenue using park & wood for motorbikes, 1st January
item.description:
169 Dorchester Avenue have built a room directly onto the park to access from their garden in which they have installed a ramp so they can take motocross/motorbikes into the park. Today two young boys both on motorbikes and the father with young girl on the front of a large motorbike were all driving erratically through the park near missing people and dogs. It is a common occurrence that needs to be stopped, you only need to see the park to see how often they are doing it as the grass is all but disappeared in areas with deep tyre tracks from the bikes visible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Murchison Avenue, Albany Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street covered in water, 1st January
item.description:
The road going towards Chislehurst has been covered in water from, I suspect, a water leak. Now the weather is getting to near freezing this will be vary dangerous when this water freezes. The whole road will be like an ice rink and needs fixing immediately before there is a serious accident.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Orpington Road, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vehicles. Parking on the brow of the hill which is a contravention of the highway way code, 1st January
item.description:
If you look at photos this hill on Cowper Road is a 1 in 5 Slope if a a vehicle is parked on the brow of the hill you could be involved in a head on collision as you have to go wide because of illegal parking it needs a Double yellow line to there to stop parking & help passing

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cowper Road, Brunswick Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
